thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Banggood Victim
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Banggood Victim

author: Banggood Victim
title: Banggood Victim
text:
Their customer service is a joke if you don't speak Chinese. They will simply copy paste the same kind of messages. Even after paying for the premium shipping my order (24489907) is stuck and they don't provide any help. They will want you to check the post office and the customs. Even if you request a cancellation they will ask you to first send the item back and produce proof that you have contacted the local post office and custom and have rejected the item with them.
Doesn't it look fishy? All the other reviews are total 5 star? International shipping which involves a lot of factors and everyone is 5 star happy? Not even Amazon can score all 5 star these days. Think about it!
